::Orchestra::

    Orchestra looked around, and then saw Zardus.  He walked closer to him,
yet remained at a safe distance.  He bowed.

    "Greetings, Zardus, Commander of the Alliance.  I am Orchestra,
ambassador for the Predacons lead by Darkfate.  Before we jump to the
meeting, would it be possible to find a more comfortable environment to
talk?" Orchestra introduced himself.
